title: Early Look at Week 1 Picks, Brandon Marshall to Seahawks (Football 05/30)
description:
Pete Prisco fills in for Will Brinson, as Nick Kostos joins the podcast to breakdown the impact of Brandon Marshall heading to the Seahawks, analyze where Dez Bryant will end up, and how Odell Beckham Jr. fits amongst the best overall players in the league. Then, Pete and Nick take an 100-days early look at the Week 1 lines across the NFL, issuing tentative picks against the spread way in advance of the start of the season.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
